title: I found my main
body:
I've been playing league of legends for more than two years (On other accounts) And I just found my main, Hecarim {{champion:120}}. Im not sure what else to say, but idk I never had so much fun, I really just felt a link with him, that I haven't felt never felt with anyone other champion, I just felt like sharing this... <3
{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

replies.body: Level 3 predator gank path OP
{{champion:154}} I used to have a main...used to. Then Riot took him away from me. :(
I know how you feel... {{champion:3}} I don't even wanna put this new shit portrait here...

> [{quoted}](name=Support Position,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0vZXyfO8,comment-id=000f0000,timestamp=2018-11-28T23:11:37.085+0000)
>
> I know how you feel... {{champion:3}} I don't even wanna put this new shit portrait here...

You played the old galio? sorry im just a bit confused, why did he get reworked again?

He wasn't being played. 

Yes I played old Galio.
{{champion:33}} Ok.

> [{quoted}](name=OneMustFall,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0vZXyfO8,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-11-27T19:38:12.550+0000)
>
> {{champion:33}} Ok.

Is that a pun that i'm missing? rammusOk, rollinOk, hmm idk

> [{quoted}](name=Khabith,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0vZXyfO8,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2018-11-27T19:39:35.127+0000)
>
> Is that a pun that i'm missing? rammusOk, rollinOk, hmm idk

Ramus is a bit of a meme in that basically all he says is OK and a few other single word lines.  Riot originally only had it in there as a placeholder for adding more voice lines later, but the community latched onto that persona and they decided to leave it.

> [{quoted}](name=ZaneShadow,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0vZXyfO8,comment-id=000300000001,timestamp=2018-11-27T21:20:39.741+0000)
>
> Ramus is a bit of a meme in that basically all he says is OK and a few other single word lines.  Riot originally only had it in there as a placeholder for adding more voice lines later, but the community latched onto that persona and they decided to leave it.

Oh, that actually made my day, lmao. I wish I found rammus's game play a little bit more engaging, that way I would play him
{{champion:33}} Yeh

He is so much fun! Running at full speed and then his ult?
Have fun with him! I always loved playing him!
I like going nimbus cloak because If I ult over a wall, I'm even faster, and ty <3
celerity change leaves Hecarim mostly untouched but idk if it's worth it anymore, sadly.

> [{quoted}](name=DM For Rat Facts,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0vZXyfO8,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2018-11-27T19:34:03.496+0000)
>
> celerity change leaves Hecarim mostly untouched but idk if it's worth it anymore, sadly.

I'm confused about that, so it says 10% more speed on item movement things, so if I ghost, predator, righteous glory. it'll take ten percent of that and add that on? Is that like a buff, can you help me with that?

so let's say you have 500 base movespeed with boots. celerity gives you nothing. let's say you E and it gets you up to 800 movespeed. celerity would buff this up to 824. This movespeed applies as a bonus and won't stack on itself.

> [{quoted}](name=DM For Rat Facts,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0vZXyfO8,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2018-11-27T21:01:17.189+0000)
>
> so let's say you have 500 base movespeed with boots. celerity gives you nothing. let's say you E and it gets you up to 800 movespeed. celerity would buff this up to 824. This movespeed applies as a bonus and won't stack on itself.

Oh, that sucks.... aren't you the azir guy?, best of luck finding that name!

Rename yourself Academy Hecarim. 

Like the skin, they'll never see you coming.

> [{quoted}](name=Academy Kayn,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0vZXyfO8,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2018-11-28T08:06:48.502+0000)
>
> Rename yourself Academy Hecarim. 
> 
> Like the skin, they'll never see you coming.

lmao
I also enjoy assassinating people with 0 counterplay while drain-tanking the ones that don't die in .7 seconds.

> [{quoted}](name=Vekkna,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0vZXyfO8,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2018-11-27T23:04:31.385+0000)
>
> I also enjoy assassinating people with 0 counterplay while drain-tanking the ones that don't die in .7 seconds.

Can't tell if your mocking me or not, but If a Hecarim is charging at you, its called CC sweetie

I'm an Alistar main. It's impossible to gank an Alistar lane as Hecarim, happened enough to me to easily counter it. Just headbutt him away. If he goes back in, just use a Q.

People love moaning about OP and broken champions who can only be stopped by CC, then moan about how all new champions have CC. People are really fickle. Ignore them, enjoy Hecarim, I find him to be pretty well balanced.

> [{quoted}](name=BiasZebra,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0vZXyfO8,comment-id=000800000001,timestamp=2018-11-29T15:45:20.741+0000)
>
> I'm an Alistar main. It's impossible to gank an Alistar lane as Hecarim, happened enough to me to easily counter it. Just headbutt him away. If he goes back in, just use a Q.
> 
> People love moaning about OP and broken champions who can only be stopped by CC, then moan about how all new champions have CC. People are really fickle. Ignore them, enjoy Hecarim, I find him to be pretty well balanced.

I was watching this one guy, and He r'd immediately and got headbutted, abut then followed up his e on the adc. Also thx for the advice <3

I'm not mocking you at all. Oppressive shit is fun to play. I'm a Zyra main ffs.

But seriously, cc only matters if you land it before Hec hits E or R and you actually see him in time. So....after lane phase cc is nice, yeah. Same deal with Rammus.

> [{quoted}](name=Vekkna,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0vZXyfO8,comment-id=000800000000,timestamp=2018-11-27T23:16:31.763+0000)
>
> I'm not mocking you at all. Oppressive shit is fun to play. I'm a Zyra main ffs.
> 
> But seriously, cc only matters if you land it before Hec hits E or R and you actually see him in time. So....after lane phase cc is nice, yeah. Same deal with Rammus.

Oh, ok just making sure. Yeah because of how League is currently, I really just find champions which can change the game very nice to play

I remember the day I found my main. Just browsing the new characters, when I first started. Looking at all the champs, thinking of the coolest ones. I saw Ziggs first. I was like, that’s a cool champ. And I wonder if the more expensive champs are cooler. So I looked at the 6300 BE. When I looked at Zoe, I was like Jesus she’s bad. Like really bad. She doesn’t have an R and her W is Garbo. And her Q, dafuq? 
I decided to save up 6300 BE



And now I oneshot flashing M7
:^)

Fair warning: Enemies (typically top laners) WILL flame you for being OP because you can run at Mach 5, even though the actual reason for their deaths is overextending, paying no attention to your charge sound, and/or place wards in the bush 5 feet from them instead of putting them in the river.

> [{quoted}](name=Baron Barian,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0vZXyfO8,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-11-27T22:01:26.739+0000)
>
> Fair warning: Enemies (typically top laners) WILL flame you for being OP because you can run at Mach 5, even though the actual reason for their deaths is overextending, paying no attention to your charge sound, and/or place wards in the bush 5 feet from them instead of putting them in the river.

Yeah i've been noticing that recently. I love knocking their lane bully into the tower and then have their entire team flame him. That's what I really enjoy about junglers in general. My capability of tilting their team is crazy. But yeah I always carry that mute button just in case <3

> [{quoted}](name=Catffeine,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0vZXyfO8,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-11-27T20:50:48.002+0000)
>
> I'm happy for you! I remember finding my love for Twitch.
> 
> To this day I can't say what drew me to him, but for some reason I just have so much fun with his kit and I find his entire character adorable. 
> 
> I wish you and Hecarim the best of futures. May the elo gods favour you. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

thx, do you prefer him In the jungle or as the adc role?
I'm a huge meta worshiper, so only ADC for me xD

> [{quoted}](name=Catffeine,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0vZXyfO8,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2018-11-27T23:31:41.600+0000)
>
> I'm a huge meta worshiper, so only ADC for me xD

nice nice

Congrats... Now it's time for you to start that Level 7 mastery grind. I remember the day I found my main...
{{sticker:katarina-love}}

>
> Congrats... Now it's time for you to start that Level 7 mastery grind. I remember the day I found my main...

I got level 6 last night, omw to level 7, thx, I'm presuming your a kat main?

> [{quoted}](name=Khabith,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0vZXyfO8,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2018-11-27T22:52:14.712+0000)

Yes I am a Kat Main, (smart presumption lol) and ironically the game I played after typing this comment got me my last S token I needed to get that Level 7 Mastery on Katarina {{champion:55}} 
I guess Karma {{champion:43}} might exist all around us... Btw, this is my main account and KatarinaScripts is my Alt.

> [{quoted}](name=Galaxyburstz,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0vZXyfO8,comment-id=000700000000,timestamp=2018-11-28T17:12:46.173+0000)

Ah gothca, well nice job on the level 7, im going to be flashing my level 6 day in and day out lol

thats great man its always a great feeling when you find that champion that feels yours !

Mine is reksai :) 

rawr

nice nice, reksai seems like a lot of fun
{{champion:76}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:76}}
Grats on the new main. I'm still waiting on a revert to get mine back {{item:3073}} {{champion:154}}
I love gnar so much i asked for him to be nerfed due how oppressive he was at the time.
I hope you like him as much as I like Ekko :)

> [{quoted}](name=Monstermushmush,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0vZXyfO8,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2018-11-28T04:26:47.743+0000)
>

I've always wanted to play ekko, and thank you <3
I actually played Hecarim quite a lot back in the day. You would like other diver Junglers like {{champion:62}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:59}} then too.

> [{quoted}](name=Eedat,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0vZXyfO8,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-11-27T21:16:04.776+0000)

I liked playing wukong for a while, and I've been peeping J4 and Vi for a while. Ill be playing those two soon, thx for the suggestion
ok?
